ygData.msgSnippet: ... Saturday ... 8am - 12 pm EST on Saturdays, 4-7pm weeknights ... 6 hours, would ve played longer but my eyes hurt.  Guess I m a lightweight ... Loud, full
ygData.messageBody:
>As we all know, the right atmosphere is required for total immersion into
>character so...
>
>When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite:
>
>Day of the week to play:
Saturday

>Time of day:
8am - 12 pm EST on Saturdays, 4-7pm weeknights

>Longest stretch of continuous play:
6 hours, would've played longer but my eyes hurt. Guess I'm a lightweight

>Way to have game sounds:
Loud, full effects

>Distance to sit from display:
about 12 to 18 inches

>TV show to have on:
Sacrelege!

>Music to listen to:
My favorite is Norrath's "Ode to Making NPC Vendor Transactions", closely
followed by a song which I think is called "Your target is too far away,
oops, now you can't see it, no wait, it's too far away again"

>Beverage (non-alcoholic):
coffee or fizzy water

>Beverage (alcoholic):
Guiness or Mike's hard lemonade

>Health Food:
My better half once brought me grilled portabella mushrooms with a rice and
bean dish and salad while I was playing. Sweet guy.

>Junk Food:
Another time I ran to the kitchen, grabbed the can opener, a spoon, and a
cold can of Spagettios while zoning.

>Clothes to wear:
A full suit of armor. Hey, you can't prove I don't!

Peace
8 Newbies of Tunare
